overview: Jayden Lee tries out a lesbian dating site and finds an older woman (Zoey Holloway) that will teach the young neophyte the art of loving another woman. A young bridesmaids (Jessie Rogers) has her first lesbian experience with an older woman (Tanya Tate) at a wedding party. A freshman in college, (Lola Foxx) receives a lesson in lesbian love from the woman (Magdalene St. Michaels) whom she rents a room from. An intern at a law firm, Ana Foxx, gets her first taste of another woman when she is invited over to the house of one of the partners, the beautiful and much older Ms. Nyomi Banxxx. Two lesbians, one a young virgin (Dani Daniels), and the other an older woman, Veronica Avluv get married and have an explosive honeymoon.
title: Finger Lickin Girlfriends 2
